ygData.subject: RE: Gargoyle Carapace
ygData.msgSnippet: could Mynthi actually drop a different lute now?  i don t know anyone who has gotten one after the patch, only those that have had the lute of the gypsy
ygData.messageBody:
could Mynthi actually drop a different lute now? i don't know anyone who
has gotten one after the patch, only those that have had the lute of the
gypsy princess since before yesterday's patch. or do the other gypsy
musicians now carry a different lute? well all i know is the LotGP doesn't
get you the breastplate =(
i will let you know what my server GM says after 2pm PST when i have my wife
talk to him.

Shada

>
> From: Jada <jadakost@...>
>
> Although, my Gypsy Lute did not get
> changed to NO DROP after the patch, so who knows.
>
>
> Jada MacAldred
> Bard of the 40th Chorus
> Povar
